analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate śākyamunaye tathāgatāya arhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya
sarva dhyāna vimokṣa samādhi samāpatti saṃkleśa vyavadāna vyutthāna jñāna balam
attarāyika dharma ananyathātva niścita vyākaraṇa vaiśāradyam
sarva saṃpad adhigamāya nairyāṇika pratipad tathātva vaiśāradyam
gartra kāma karma jñāna pūrva gamam jñāna anuparivarti
sarva vāc karma jñāna pūrvaṃgamam jñāna anuparivarti
sarva manaskarma jñāna pūrva gamam jñāna anuparivarti
atīte dhvanya saṅgam a pratihatam jñāna darśanam pravartate
anāgata idhvanya saṅgam a pratihatam jñāna darśanam pravartate
pratyutpanna idhvanya saṅgam apratihatam jñāna darśanam pravartate
nirātmānaḥ sarva dharmāḥ sattvāḥ ca nairātmyam na adhimucyatte
atas tathāgatasya sattveṣu mahā karuṇā utpadyate
anyonya vivāda saṃgṛhītaḥ vata ayam loka saṃniveśaḥ vyāpāda khila dveṣa pratipanna
viparyāsa saṃprayuktaḥ vata ayam loka saṃniveśaḥ viṣama mārga prayāta
lubdhaḥ lobha abhibhūtaḥ vata ayam tṛptaḥ para citta apahārī
dhana dhānya gṛha putra bhāryā tṛdhā dāsāḥ vata ime sattvāḥ asāre sāra saṃjñinaḥ
viṣama ājīvāḥ vata ime sattvāḥ anyonya parivañcana upasthitāḥ

original: 28 anṛptā vateme sattvā lābhasatkāraślokopacaritāstṛptā sma iti pratijñānate |
analyzed: anṛptāḥ vata ime sattvāḥ lābha satkāra śloka upacaritāḥ tṛptā smaḥ iti
nitya abhiratāḥ vata ime sattvāḥ eka ātta akliṣṭa duḥkha bhājane
kāraṇa upagāḥ punar sarva dharmāḥ viṭhapana pratyupasthāna lakṣaṇāḥ
idam punar agram asaṅga jñānam utsṛjya viśiṣṭa parinirvāṇa artha

original: sattvā hīnapānaṃ prārthayatte yadidaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānaṃ tebhya udāramatiṃ rocayiṣyāmīti yadidaṃ buddhajñānādhyālambanatayi iti tathāgatasya  #
analyzed: sattvāḥ hīna pānam prārthayat te yat idam śrāvaka pratyekabuddha yānam tebhyaḥ udāra matim rocayiṣyāmi iti yat idam buddha jñāna adhyālambana tayi iti tathāgatasya
śruśrūṣamāṇa a śuśrūṣamāṇeṣu sama citta tā
na asti tathāgatasya a pariśuddha kāyasamudācāra tā
na asti tathāgatasya a pariśuddha vāc samudācāra tā
na asti tathāgat sya a pariśuddha manaḥsamudācāra tā
na asti tathāgatasya apariśuddha jīva tā
yathā samāhite citte svīye āsane ttarhitaḥ
adhas kāyāt śītalāḥ vāri dhārāḥ syandate
ākāśe vikramate tat yathā pakṣī śakuniḥ
pṛthivyām unmajjana nimajjanam karoti tat yathā api nāma udake
udake ipi a bhidyamānaḥ gacchati tat yathā api nāma mahā pṛthivyām
dhūma apati api prajvalati api tat yathā api nāma mahān agni skandhaḥ
sva kāyāt api mahā vāri dhārāḥ utsṛjati
tat yathā api nāma mahā meghaḥ

original: 15 yābhirvāridhārābhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalito'gnināekajvalībhūto nirvāpyate |
analyzed: yābhiḥ vāri dhārābhiḥ ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ ādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalitaḥ agninā ekajvalībhūtaḥ nirvāpyate

original: 16 imāvapi candrasūryā evaṃmaharddhika evaṃmahānubhāvā evaṃmahījaskī pāṇinā parāmṛṣati parimārjayati |
analyzed: imau api candra sūryāḥ evam maharddhikaḥ evam mahā anubhāvāḥ evam mahījaskī pāṇinā parāmṛṣati parimārjayati
yāvat brahma lokāt api sattvām kāyena
sa ākāram sa uddeśam sa nidānam pūrva nivāsam anusmarati sma
tatas cyuta k iha api upapannaḥ
sthita an avanata pralamba bāhu tā
advaya buddha vihāra parama pārami prāptaḥ
asaṃbhinna tathāgata vimokṣa jñāna niṣṭhā gataḥ
an atta madhya buddha bhūmi samatā adhigataḥ

original: 33 śāstā sarvasattvānāṃ 34 pitā bodhisattvānāṃ 35 rājā āryapudgalānāṃ |
analyzed: śāstā sarva sattvānām pitā bodhisattvānām rājā ārya pudgalānām
pratiṣṭhita utīta anāgata pratyutpannānām buddhānām bhagavatām jñāne
sarva sattva āśaya su vidhi jñāḥ
an ābhoga buddha kārya a pratiprasnabdhaḥ
apagata śākhā pattna palāśa prapāṭikā tvac phalguḥ
sarva dharma praveśa mudraḥ nāma samādhiḥ
sarva dharma samavasaraṇa sāgaramudraḥ nāma samādhiḥ
sarva dharma sama tā nāma samādhiḥ
sarva dharma pada prabhedaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
samyakta mithyātva sarva saṃyasanaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
sarva sukha duḥkha nirabhinandī nāma samādhiḥ
arajaḥ virajaḥ naya yuktaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
araṇa saraṇa sarva samavasaraṇaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
vāc kali vidhaṃsana gagana kalpaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
ākāśa āsaṅga vimukti nirupalepaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
dhāraṇī śruta udgrahaṇa artha nirdeśa vaiśāṃradyam
nairātmya adhigamāt para viheṭhana a nimitta samudācāra sahaja anadhigata īryāpatha tri karma pariśuddha mahārakṣa saṃpanna vaiśāradyam
sadā udgṛhīta dharma avismaraṇa prajñā upāya niṣṭhā gata sattva nistāraṇa prasāda saṃdarśana śubha ānattarāyika vaiśāradyam
upāya kauśalya sarva sattva carita ādhipatya parama yāna niryāṇa saṃdarśakāḥ
jñāna pūrva gama an abhisaṃskāra niravadya sarva janma abhimukha pravṛttāḥ
daśa kuśa loeta kāya vāc manaḥkarma āttāḥ
sarva duḥkha skandha saha anātma upādāna sarva sattvadhātu parityāgena
kipat kṛcchra bāla śrāvaka madhya śubha vyūha ratna kalpavṛkṣa dṛḍha sarvajñātā acitta asaṃpramuṣitāḥ
sumeru parvata rāja vat akampya cittaḥ
sarva tathāgata viṣaya avatāra jñāna kuśalaḥ
māyā marīci daka candra svapra pratiśrutkā pratibhāsa pratibimba nirmāṇa upama dharma adhimuktaḥ
buddhakṣetra vyūha ānatta praṇidhāna prasthāna parigṛhītaḥ
asaṃkhyepa lokadhātu buddha anusmṛti samādhi satata samitā abhimukhībhūtaḥ
nānā dṛṣṭa anuśaya paryavasthāna kleśa praśamana kuśalaḥ
amogha kāya vāc manaskarma ātta abhiyuktaḥ
na punar bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ kāma guṇaiḥ liptaḥ

original: 78 te ca bodhisattvamahāsattvā bhūyastena sarve kumārabhūtāḥ |
analyzed: te ca bodhisattva mahāsattvāḥ bhūyas tena sarve kumāra bhūtāḥ
an utpannānām pāpakānām akuśalānām dharmāṇām an utpādāya chandam janayati

original: 1 utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānā dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati |
analyzed: utpannānām pāpakānām akuśalānām dharmāṇām prahāṇāya chandam janayati
an utpannānām kuśalānām dharmāṇām utpādāya chandam janayati

original: 3 utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitāya bhūyobhāvāya asaṃpramoṣāya paripūraṇāya chandaṃ janayati |
analyzed: utpannānām kuśalānām dharmāṇām sthitāya bhūyobhāvāya a saṃpramoṣāya paripūraṇāya chandam janayati
chanda samādhi prahāṇa saṃskāra samanvāgataḥ ṛddhipādaḥ
citta samādhi prahāṇa saṃskāra samanvāgataḥ ṛddhipādaḥ
vīrya samādhi prahāṇa saṃskāra samanvāgataḥ ṛddhipādaḥ
mīmaṃsā samādhi prahāṇa saṃskāra samanvāgataḥ ṛddhipādaḥ
hrasvam āśvasan hrasvam āśvasāmi iti yathābhūtam prajānāti
hrasvam praśvasan hrasvam praśvasāmi iti yathābhūtam prajānāti

dīrgha praśvasan dīrgham praśvasāmi iti yathābhūtam prajānāti
sarva kāya pratisaṃvedya āśvasan sarva kāya pratisaṃvedya āśvasāmi iti yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: 12 sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |

original: 14 prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārāṃ praśvasanprasrabhya kāyasaṃskārāṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |

analyzed: prīti pratisaṃvedī praśvasan prīti pratisaṃvedī praśvasāmi iti yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: 18 cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |

su ākhyātaḥ bhagavataḥ dharma vinayaḥ su praveditaḥ
śāstā ca asya tathāgataḥ ūrhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
yāvat deva manuṣyebhyaḥ samyak su prakāśitaḥ
tri prarivarta dvādaśa ākāra dharmacakra pravartanam
ārya satyānām prathama parivartaḥ darśana mārgaḥ
ārya satyānām dvitīya parivartaḥ bhāvanā mārgaḥ
ārya satyānām tṛtīyaḥ parivartaḥ śaikṣa mārgaḥ
sarva buddha viṣaya avatāra jñāna āloka alaṃkāraḥ

original: viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati |1
analyzed: viviktam kāmaiḥ viviktam pāpakaiḥ akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ sa vitarkam sa vicāram viveka jam prīti sukham prathamam dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati

original: sa vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāścetasa ekotībhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijñāṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya
analyzed: sa vitarka vicārāṇām vyupaśamāt adhyātmam saṃprasādāḥ cetasaḥ ekotībhāvāt a vitarkam a vicāram samādhi jñām prīti sukham dvitīyam dhyānam upasaṃpadya

original: sa prītervirāgādupekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayati yattadāryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimāṃ sukhaṃ vihārīti  #
analyzed: sa prīteḥ virāgāt upekṣakaḥ viharati smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan sukham ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayati yat tat āryāḥ ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimām sukham vihārī iti

original: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya  #
analyzed: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva ca saumanasya daurmanasyayoḥ astaṃgamāt aduḥkha asukham upekṣā smṛti pariśuddham caturtham dhyānam upasaṃpadya
sa sarvaśas nūpa saṃjñānām samatikramāt pratigha saṃjñānām astaṃgamāt nānātva saṃjñānām a manasikārāt anattam ākāśam iti ākāśa ānatti āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati

original: sa sarvaśa ākāśānattyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānattavijñānamiti vijñānānattyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati | 2
analyzed: sa sarvaśas ākāśa ānatti āyatanam samatikramya ānatta vijñānam iti vijñāna ānatti āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati

original: sa sarvaśo vijñānānattyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiñcidityākiñcanyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati | 3
analyzed: sa sarvaśas vijñāna ānatti āyatanam samatikramya na asti kiñcid iti ākiñcanya āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati

original: sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyātanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati | 4
analyzed: sa sarvaśas ākiñcanya āyātanam samatikramya na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati

original: sa maitrīsahagatena cittenāvaireṇāsaṃpannenāvyābādhena vipulena mahadgatenāpramāṇenādvayena subhāvitenaikā diśamadhimucya sphāritvopasaṃpadya  #
analyzed: sa maitrī sahagatena cittena a vaireṇa a saṃpannena a vyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena advayena su bhāvitena ekā diśam adhimucya sphāritvā upasaṃpadya

original: tathā dvitīyaṃ tathā tṛtīyaṃ tathā caturthamityūrdhamadhastiryaksarvaśaḥ sarvāvattamimaṃ lokaṃ | 6 ||70 ||
analyzed: tathā dvitīyam tathā tṛtīyam tathā caturtham iti ūrdham adhas tiryak sarvaśas sarvāvattam imam lokam
nūpī nūpāṇi paśyati ayam prathamaḥ vimokṣaḥ

original: 1 adhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyatyayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ |
analyzed: adhyātmam anūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati ayam dvitīyaḥ vimokṣaḥ

original: 2 śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatyayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ | 3
analyzed: śubham vimokṣam kāyena sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya viharati ayam tṛtīyaḥ vimokṣaḥ
sa sarvaśas nūpa saṃjñānām samatikramāt pratigha saṃjñānām astaṃgamāt nānātva saṃjñānām a manasikārāt anattam ākāśam iti ākāśa ānatti āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati ayam

original: sa sarvaśa ākāśānattyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānattaṃ vijñānamiti vijñānānattyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharatyayaṃ pañcamo vimokṣaḥ | 5
analyzed: sa sarvaśas ākāśa ānatti āyatanam samatikramya ānattam vijñānam iti vijñāna ānatti āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati ayam pañcamaḥ vimokṣaḥ

original: sa sarvaśo vijñānānattyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiñcidityākiñcanyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharatyayaṃ ṣaṣṭo vimokṣaḥ | 6
analyzed: sa sarvaśas vijñāna ānatti āyatanam samatikramya na asti kiñcid iti ākiñcanya āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati ayam ṣaṣṭaḥ vimokṣaḥ

original: sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharatyayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ | 7
analyzed: sa sarvaśas ākiñcanya āyatanam samatikramya na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati ayam saptamaḥ vimokṣaḥ

original: sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃdjñāveditanirodhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatyayamaṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ | 8 ||71
analyzed: sa sarvaśas na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatanam samatikramya saṃdjñā vedita nirodham kāyena sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya viharati ayam aṣṭamaḥ vimokṣaḥ  /

original: adhyātmanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni tāni khalu nūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyabhibhūya paśyati evaṃsaṃjñī ca bhavati  #
analyzed: adhyātma nūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇa durvarṇāni tāni khalu nūpāṇi abhibhūya jānāti abhibhūya paśyati evaṃsaṃjñī ca bhavati

original: adhyātmanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati mahadganāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni tāni khalu nūpāṇyabhibhūya jānātyabhibhūya paśyati evaṃsaṃjñī ca bhavati  #
analyzed: adhyātma nūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati mahadganāni suvarṇa durvarṇāni tāni khalu nūpāṇi abhibhūya jānāti abhibhūya paśyati evaṃsaṃjñī ca bhavati

original: adhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā umakapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇaseyaṃ  #
analyzed: adhyātmam anūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīla varṇāni nīla nidarśanāni nīla nirbhāsāni tat yathā umaka puṣpam saṃpannam vā vārāṇaseyam

original: vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsaṃ evamevādhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni  #
analyzed: vastram nīlam nīla varṇam nīla nidarśanam nīla nirbhāsam evam eva adhyātmam anūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīla varṇāni nīla nidarśanāni

original: adhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā vārāṇaseyaṃ  #
analyzed: adhyātmam anūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pīta varṇāni pīta nidarśanāni pīta nirbhāsāni tat yathā karṇikāra puṣpam saṃpannam vā vārāṇaseyam

original: vastraṃ pītaṃ pītavarṇaṃ pītanidarśanaṃ pītanirbhāsaṃ evamevādhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni  #
analyzed: vastram pītam pīta varṇam pīta nidarśanam pīta nirbhāsam evam eva adhyātmam anūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati pīta varṇāni pīta nidarśanāni pīta nirbhāsāni

original: adhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni lohitanirbhāsāni tadyathā bandhujīvakapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ  #
analyzed: adhyātmam anūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohita varṇāni lohita nidarśanāni lohita nirbhāsāni tat yathā bandhujīvaka puṣpam saṃpannam

original: vā vārāṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ lohitaṃ lohitavarṇaṃ lohitanidarśanaṃ lohitanirbhāsaṃ evamevādhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohitavarṇāni  #
analyzed: vā vārāṇaseyam vastram lohitam lohita varṇam lohita nidarśanam lohita nirbhāsam evam eva adhyātmam anūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohita varṇāni
lohita nidarśanāni lohita nirbhāsāni idam pañcamam abhibhu āyatanam

original: adhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati avadātāni avadātavarṇāni avadātanidarśanāni avadātanirbhāsāni tadyathā uśanastārakāyavarṇa avadāta  #
analyzed: adhyātmam anūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati avadātāni avadāta varṇāni avadāta nidarśanāni avadāta nirbhāsāni tat yathā avadāta

original: avadātavarṇa avadātanidarśana avadātanirbhāsaḥ evamevādhyātmamanūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati avadātāni avadātavarṇāni avadātanidarśanāni  #
analyzed: avadāta varṇa avadāta nidarśana avadāta nirbhāsaḥ evam eva adhyātmam anūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā nūpāṇi paśyati avadātāni avadāta varṇāni avadāta nidarśanāni
avadāta nirbhāsāni idam ṣaṣṭha bhibhu āyatanam
sa sarvaśas nūpa saṃjñānām samatikramāt pratigha saṃjñānām astaṃgamāt nānātva saṃjñānām a manasikārāt anattam ākāśam iti ākāśa ānatti āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati

original: sa sarvaśa ākāśānattyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānattaṃ vijñānamiti vijñānānattyāyatanamupasaṃpadya viharati idamaṣṭamamabhibhvāyatanaṃ | 8 ||72 ||
analyzed: sa sarvaśas ākāśa ānatti āyatanam samatikramya ānattam vijñānam iti vijñāna ānatti āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati idam aṣṭamam abhibhvāyatanam  /
pṛthivī kṛtsnām iti eke iti ūrdham adhas tiryak advayam apramāṇam
ap tejaḥ vāyu nīla pīta lohita avadāta kṛtsnām iti eke saṃjānate iti ūrdham adhas tiryak advayam apramāṇam
artha pratisaraṇena bhavitavyam na vyañjana pratisaraṇena
dharma pratisaraṇena bhavitavyam na pudgala pratisaraṇena
jñāna pratisaraṇena bhavitavyam na vijñāna pratisaraṇena
nīta artha sūtra pratisaraṇena bhavitavyam na neya artha sūtra pratisaraṇena
samāhita cittaḥ yathābhūtam prajānāti yathābhūtam paśyati
vimuktasya vimuktaḥ asmi iti jñāna darśanam bhavati
advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram abhinnam acchinnam
anupātta mahābhūta hetukaḥ sattva ākhyaḥ sattva ākhyaḥ manojña manojñāḥ ca
sattva ākhyaḥ sattva ākhyaḥ manojña amanojñāḥ ca

original: 6 yadapīcchayā paryeṣamāṇo na labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ |
analyzed: yat api icchayā paryeṣamāṇaḥ na labhate tat api duḥkham
tat yathā manuṣyāḥ ekatyāḥ ca devāḥ
eka tva kāyāḥ nānā tva saṃjñinaḥ
eka tva kāyāḥ eka tva saṃjñinaḥ
na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatanam
tathāgatasya attike duṣṭa citta rudhira utpādanam
na ca pareṣām doṣa attara skhalita gaveṣī
pūrvā diś avanamati paścimā diś unnamati
paścimā diś avanamati pūrvā diś unnamati
dakṣiṇā diś avanamati uttarā diś unnamati
uttarā diś avanamati dakṣiṇā diś unnamati
na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatanam
rāghavaḥ nāga rājā hastikacchaḥ nāga rājā
mahā pṛthivīm akhilām akaṇṭakām anutyātām adaṇḍena aśastreṇa dharmeṇa samena abhinirjitya adhyāvasati  /
anya jāti upadṛṣṭa ātta upasaṃhāra lakṣaṇam
sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma pratyakṣam
na eva śāśvataḥ na a śāśvataḥ ca

original: 10 bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ |
analyzed: bhavati ca na bhavati ca tathāgataḥ param

original: 11 naiva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt |
analyzed: na eva bhavati na na bhavati tathāgataḥ param maraṇāt
nava nalina patra su viśuddha nayanā
a kṛṣṭa uptā taṇḍula pala śālīḥ
puṣpa abhikīrṇa kalpavṛkṣaiḥ nānā alaṃkāra puṣpa phala avanata agra viṭapaiḥ upaśobhitaḥ
sa matta sthūla avalokana nayana abhirāma
yatra sūrya candramasām prabhāyāḥ gatiḥ na asti
na ca bhagavataḥ mukha dvārasya unmiñjitam
roga spṛṣṭā vigata rogā bhavati sma
vikala indriyāḥ paripūrṇa indriyā bhavatti sma
sa ced puṣṭaḥ praśna vyākaraṇāya avaṃkāśam kuryāt

original: 52 tena hi śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru |
analyzed: tena hi śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru
attaśas hāsya prekṣiṇā api jīvita hetoḥ api
mahā pṛhivī niśrāya sāmagrī vaśena sarva bījāni

original: bhūyasyā mātrayā abhidyotayamāno gāthābhigītena saṃprakāśayati sma |
analyzed: bhūyasyā mātrayā abhidyotayamānaḥ gāthā abhigītena saṃprakāśayati sma
yadi bhagavān ājñāsīt sa devakam lokam saṃnipatitam
bhūmi ākramaṇam bhūmeḥ bhūmyāt tara saṃkramaṇam
aśita pīta khādita āsvāditāni samyak sukhena paripākam gacchatti
cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa jā vedanā sukhā api duḥkhā api aduḥkhā asukhā apa
śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ saṃsparśa jā vedanā sukhā api duḥkhā api aduḥkhā asukhā api
sukhā api kāyikī duḥkhā api aduḥkhā asukhā api kāyikī
sukhā api caitasikī duḥkhā api aduḥkhā asukhā api caitasikī
sukhā api sa āmiṣā duḥkhā api aduḥkhā asukhā api sa āmiṣā
sukhā api gredha āśritā duḥkhā api aduḥkhā asukhā api gredha āśritā
sukhā api naiṣkramya āśritā duḥkhā api aduḥkhā asukhā api naiṣkramya āśritā
dṛṣṭa āttena adṛṣṭasya ātta samīkaraṇa samākhyānam
su sat prakāśa abhra āttaḥ rthaḥ
śatam samāpta lambhānām gaṇa anāgatiḥ namā ucyate
śatam vibhūtigamānām tat śākṣaṇam nāma ucyate

original: 23 iti hi tachākṣaṇagaṇanayā sumeruparvatarājo lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gacchet |
analyzed: iti hi sumeru parvata rājaḥ lakṣa nikṣepa kriyayā parikṣayam gacchet
tatas api uttari paramāṇu rajaḥpraveśaḥ nāma gaṇanā
dvau vā trayaḥ vā chadana paryāpa dātavyāḥ

original: 7 na nāgaśīrṣaka nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā |
analyzed: na nāgaśīrṣaka nivāsanam nivāsayiṣyāmi iti śikṣā karaṇīyā

original: 46 nodanena sūpikaṃ praticchādayiṣyāmaḥ sūpikena vā odanaṃ |
analyzed: nodanena sūpikam praticchādayiṣyāmaḥ sūpikena vā odanam
na stūpa ākṛtim avamṛḍya piṇḍapātam paribhokṣyāmaḥ
na sa āmiṣegā pāṇinā udaka sthālakam grahīṣyāmaḥ
na sa āmiṣeṇa udakena āttarikam bhikṣum sprakṣyāmaḥ
na avadhyāna prekṣiṇā āttarikasya bhikṣoḥ pātram avalokayiṣyāmaḥ
na sa āmiṣam udakam attargṛhe chorayiṣyāmaḥ sattam gṛhiṇam an avalokya
nānā āstīrṇa pṛthivī pradeśe pātram sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ

original: 75 na taṭe na prapāte na prāgbhāre pātraṃ sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: na taṭe na prapāte na prāgbhāre pātram sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ
na nadī āhārya āhāriṇyām pratisrtota pātreṇa udakam grahiṣyāmaḥ
na utthitaḥ niṣaṇāya a glāna ava dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ
na niṣaṇaḥ nipannāya a glānāya dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ

original: 79 na nīcatarake āsane niṣaṇa uccatarake āsane niṣaṇāyā glānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: na nīcatarake āsane niṣaṇe uccatarake āsane niṣaṇāyāḥ glānāya dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ

original: 80 na pṛṣṭhato gacchattaḥ purato gacchate aglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: na pṛṣṭhatas gacchattaḥ puratas gacchate a glānāya dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ

original: 81 notpathena gacchattaḥ pathena gacchata aglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: na utpathena gacchattaḥ pathena gacchata a glānāya dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ
na udruṇṭhikā kṛtāya a glānāya dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ
na utkṛṣṭikākṛtāya a glānāya dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ
na utsaktikā kṛtāya a glānāya dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ
na vyastika akṛtāya aglānāya dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ
na paryastika akṛtāya aglānāya dharmam deśayiṣyāmaḥ
na a glānāḥ utthitāḥ uccāra prasrāvam kariṣyāmaḥ

original: 103 nāglānā udaka uccāraprasrāvaṃ kheṭaṃ siṅgāṇakaṃ vāttaṃ viriktaṃ chorayiṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: na a glānāḥ udake uccāra prasrāvam kheṭam siṅgāṇakam vāttam viriktam chorayiṣyāmaḥ

original: 104 nāglānāḥ saharitapradeśe uccāraprasrāvaṃ kheṭaṃ śiṅgāṇakaṃ vāttaṃ viriktaṃ chorayiṣyāmaḥ |
analyzed: na a glānāḥ sa harita pradeśe uccāra prasrāvam kheṭam śiṅgāṇakam vāttam viriktam chorayiṣyāmaḥ

original: 105 nāsādhikaṃ pauruṣyaṃ vṛkṣamadhirokṣyāma anyatrāpada iti śikṣa karaṇīyā | 106 ||264 ||
analyzed: na asādhikam pauruṣyam vṛkṣam adhirokṣyāma anyatra āpadaḥ iti śikṣa karaṇīyā  /
gandha mālya vilepana varṇaka dhāraṇa viratiḥ
tathāgatasya āttike duṣṭa citta rudhira utpādāḥ
prasrāva karaṇe prasrāva karaṇasya mukhe varcaḥ mārge vā
uttara manuṣya dharma yukta tā ukta vartamānaḥ
chanda poṣadham ārocayati ārocitam ca pravedayate
